17 May 2012

Whiteboard - Day One

Last night, I setup and deployed a little web app I’ve been working on in a bit of spare time during the last couple of weeks. The app called is Whiteboard, and is basically a simple whiteboarding tool of sorts.

Some Interesting Tidbits

This is information gathered for Whiteboard being live less than a day:

  • 1 Vague Tweet from myself, was retweeted 7 times and favourited 4 times.
  • 265 people have since visited the site.
  • 37 people considered signing up by clicking through to the sign up page. 29 Actually signed up.
  • 71 whiteboards have been created.
  • 2 suggestions made for features to add to the app.

whiteboard.markconnell.co.uk
